definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: The best of the detective novelists, Chandler took the genre to new heights that generations of writers have tried to reach.
sentences.chinese: 錢德勒的這一作品將推理小說達到一個新高度。

sentences.english: It can be simple tasks like washing the dishes or finishing up two chapters of a mystery novel.
sentences.chinese: 可以是簡單的任務比如洗盤子或看完兩章推理小說。

sentences.english: He occupied himself writing a mystery story.
sentences.chinese: 他埋首於推理小說的寫作。

sentences.english: He likes Haruki Murakami , I also liked detective story, the logic in the book.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡村上春樹，也喜歡推理小說，具有邏輯性的書。

sentences.english: I always like the series "Whodunit" by Wei Sili.
sentences.chinese: 我一直很喜歡衛斯理系列的推理小說。

sentences.english: He is an eager reader of mystery novels.
sentences.chinese: 他熱衷於閱讀推理小說。

sentences.english: Poison is a mystery writer's best friend.
sentences.chinese: 毒藥是推理小說作者們的最愛。

definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3

definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
